page.title: 19Cosham High Street 1
page.content: There are several main shopping areas in Portsmouth and Cosham High Street serves the Northern part of the city. There is a cinema, some large supermarkets, reasonable parking space, a railway station, a bus terminus and a wide variety of small shops. Public opinion was sought on the following:- 1) Does the area require a department store ? On the whole men did not want any more shops at all, while the ladies would have liked a store of the 'Marks and Spencer' or 'C & A' type. 2) Is the area kept clean and tidy ? When we were there it was quite tidy and the majority of those asked said it was usually good. 3) How far away do you live ? 90% of the shoppers lived in the local area.
